etjKxhAxfnqZcHG56t--zA.text: This poke is so delicious! Until today, I hadn't been able to find poke like I had in Hawaii. If you don't eat raw fish, there are other options. This is a MUST HAVE!!

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States. The Niner with mix of tuna and salmon plus seaweed salad

Glu3lN0dMinZpJ5sKAUItQ.text: I've always loved sushi but was skeptical about trying a poke bowl. I am now a regular at King Fish Poke. The food as well as the staff are top notch!!

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States

ogOF_Xz1ev0gV1c7G7CktQ.text: The food is definitely fresh and tasty. I liked the fact you can choose a rice or salad poke bowl or make it a burrito. You can put any amount of toppings you want with a few costing extra. I will post a picture next time.

ZahvykBJ52l_jljuNzGIFA.text: I think the food is so good! We finally have pokebowl in this area! The sashimi is so fresh and taste so good!

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States

kvxp4vwPSThpNui_I5jSIQ.text: King Fish is in my usual hangout area, so I thought I'd try it out. Like the minimalistic interior a lot :) definitely insta-friendly! A fan of healthy food here. All the ingredients are really fresh. I enjoy the combination of salmon and sushi rice with their special King Fish Sauce. Adding edamame and roasted seaweed slices is also a good idea.

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States

GQUZvW2YEvgLTNLAhFVMFQ.text: Generally a good concept. I have eat at a few Poke bars where you choose a disk. Here you get to decide what goes into the bowl. The ingredients are fresh. The service is ok, nothing special. The initial smell of the place was a turn off. Smelled like detergent. After brushing that smell aside it was a good experience.

dduPcFuH5grlVuIq_-xZzQ.text: King Fish some of the freshest poke products I've found. My favorite item that I've tried recently is the sushirito. Not as much rice or toppings as the bowl but the perfect amount to get a great bite every time you dig in. I usually go for tuna or salmon with sushi rice (so flavorful and delicious). The King Fish classic, Yuzu wasabi, and shrimp sauce are all great recommendations that I would try based on your preference. You can also mix and match if you'd like free. The service here is always fast and efficient which is why I'll always be a repeat customer.

02ooahTUJ_CgtmCesI8esg.text: Very clean, great customer service and wide variety of items. Generous portions and numerous options. They do salads, bowls and Sushi burritos. Parking deck in the back has lots of 30 minute and one hour parking and there is plenty of seating at tables and countertops.

y-NCzYbAgB2207L7empDIQ.text: One of my favorite places to grab lunch or dinner.  The owners are great.  The restaurant is clean and the food is always fresh.

HfCxTJzoNVnzg9V6vxZT8A.text: This is going to be the freshest poke restaurant you'll eat at in Charlotte. The Braveheart bowl is my personal favorite. I'd recommend this place to anybody that's visiting or anyone who lives here. The quality and customer service is absolutely amazing.

zozJpmANb-Sp68JPL3xZvQ.text: Such a hidden gem tucked away in the University area! Loved the poke bowl! I got a large and couldn't even finish it. Had to take it home for later. Prices are very reasonable.

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States

E1hZibS4OYvjkrQXMMttUw.text: I've been to a few poke places and am so glad they finally opened one near the college in Charlotte! Reasonable prices and for so much food. A regular can fill me up and have a bit left over for a snack.  The customer service is really.good, high quality fresh fish every day! Definately a go to place!

UrRmnxWNhhL1_ih6hpzwiA.text: I used to love traveling to either NY or out west for work because I could go get poke out there. Then, finally, we have a place here in north Charlotte!  Everything here is very bright and fresh. The restaurant itself is nice and bright and the staff is so incredibly friendly it just gives you good confidence before you even order.  I'm familiar with the concept of poke, but from what I've seen with other customers coming in, the staff is more than open to helping a first timer through. They're all always cheery and smiling.  Happy to say the ambiance isn't a cover up for anything, just a nice touch! The food is great, everything is so fresh. All of the proteins I've tried here (Shrimp, Ahi tuna, and spicy tuna and salmon) are great, and the vegetables are nice and crisp.  I've been here a few times and have used the classic sauce each time. It's not that I am not adventurous, but it's so good, I've been experimenting with other protein combos first. Maybe I'll try other sauces some time, but I'd suggest going with Classic your first time.

DxD4R-I_7TX_JPF49uUIRQ.text: Great service and fair pricing there.  Their ingredients is fresh and good.  Will definitely come back and dine again.

inxc5E6A6BnJpNwoOD-ntg.text: King Fish Poke exceeded my expectations. The options were great and fresh. I went for their newer item on the menu: the Beef Bowl with sushi rice. I incorporated varying mix-ins of my choice which was plentiful. Mixed with their Sriracha Aioli. Topped with green onions and garlic crisps. Awesome service provided! Would definitely be back for more.

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States. Beef Bowl
Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States. Beef Bowl with unlimited mix-ins

IDMSHfbNOca66B5JzG_QBg.text: Fish and all the toppings were fresh and tasty. Like the idea of making your own poke combinations with interesting sauce choices.

an7i10GEgCWKx8kwOi5rcQ.text: It's good for Charlotte. I am a very picky eater and I've definitely had better but for Charlotte it's good. Price can be a little steep but I would recommend this place

rS0tE9NLyauClWNe-GYIfg.text: Delicious! The restaurant was very clean and new. The ingredients are super fresh and light, perfect for lunch!

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States

pIrZ4u7UnsYK0ylUMN1etA.text: Absolutely delicious! This was my first time here (or having a poke bowl in general) and it's similar to like a chipotle or subway where you tell them what you want in your bowl. My friend had the sushi burrito and it looked amazing. Fresh ingredients and quality tasting fish. I devoured my bowl and I'll definitely be back. Also the place is very clean and has modern interior design which is pleasing to the eye. If you're hesitant about coming here or even trying poke, don't be.

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States

zEEtt31sFtY5nbbeFb8wMQ.text: Tried King Fish for the first time today. Charlotte has been flooded with new poke bowl spots all of a sudden. This one is about a 4 block walk from the McCullough light rail stop, which is convenient if you're coming from the Tryon side of UNCC for lunch, say. I tried salmon and tuna poke with gochujang sauce (which was not really two flames spicy, but still good). Added in a bunch of veggies, some crab salad and avocado, and crunchy bits on top. Verdict: for the price of a pack of grocery store sushi, you get a big fresh bowl of goodness made to order. It's not fancy, the quality of fish is about what you'd expect in the $10-12 fast food sushi price range. But everything tastes fresh and good. Will definitely go back!

-GHthCChfPu_XudIdsLfDQ.text: The food is great! I eat here often! The only reason for the review of 4 stars is because, the bowls used are plastic and I'm assuming the non-compostable plastic. For a place that serves fish, I would imagine that it would be mindful about the waste that will unfortunately end up in the oceans. I will still eat here but will opt for the burrito. If the plastic that is used is biodegradable I'll change my review and will stand corrected.

7W19o1AOXyTfdY5ZP0XUBw.text: Completely addicted.   I love the make your own bowl. I'm the kind of person that knows exactly what I want and that's what I get.   Food is always fresh and plentiful. I've never felt underwhelmed by the toppings. Always delicious!  Try to avoid the noon rush though. It gets a little backed up.

uixdKVPDUlo9VPxgjcqt9g.text: Awesome poke place and the workers are very friendly, but my boyfriend got sick after eating here every time so just be careful.

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States

_3oaebwqTHL5pRrmzpiHsA.text: Really good quality ingredients and yummy sauces. My poke bowl was delicious i did half rice and half salad because I couldn't make up my mind. The people here are also really nice and helpful.

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States. Salmon, Ahi, half salad, half rice, mango, carrots, seaweed, ginger, topped with seaweed salad, nori, and masago. 2 sauces they recommended.

M4RqR27vaRXXoC0zH8rIvA.text: Just do it. Amazing food at great prices. Often times come here for dinner, eat half of a large bowl, and half for lunch the enxt day making it very cost effective.

NZ7sxIDzMMDax5qb6rQOEQ.text: Living and working on this side of town keeps getting better. I stopped in for poke and can't wait to try their sushi burritos too. Fish was fresh and generous. Love that they had suggested poke bowls with their favorites or you can build your own. The regular size was enough for two meals on easy to devour in one. I can't wait to come back and try more of their sauces.

3Qr1OAey_ZYQX9PQ9ILzLg.text: The menu has several bowl options or you can build your own bowl/burrito. I got the Friday bowl with shrimp, tuna & salmon with brown rice. You have options for sushi rice or lettuce if you prefer. They have numerous toppings and sauces to please any picky poke eater. The dish was very fresh and I was overall very happy with my lunch.

Zou1VUR_HWNLc8i46tlgzA.text: Incredibly fresh fish. Fresh ingredients. Amazing flavors!! House sauce is great, seaweed salad has great flavor.   The food is just as great as the owners, truly passionate and care about putting out a great product. Owner talked to me for 5 minutes to make sure I was enjoying the meal.   Price is excellent especially for the amount of food!!   Highly recommend to anyone!!! I will definitely be coming back.  Keeps getting better every time I come in!

v6Dez8dHhGgCzX1-k7fnSQ.text: Very happy with my experience at KFP! I placed a large order (7 bowls) and all were done correctly. The inside of the store was clean and the staff were friendly and accommodating- will definitely be back!

rQ24J4xkwxq-nkHlW-JMWQ.text: I will not go back to the old place I had before finding this gem! The food is delicious, the fish so much more tender and the customer service was incredible and I felt so welcomed. I'm sold! I had a signature Poke Bowl (The Braveheart) and modified it slightly to add in King Fish Classic sauce to cut down the spice of the Sriracha Aioli. Both sauces were amazing on their own. You can tell a lot of time has been put into making and crafting them. One of the owners served me and spent time talking with me. Genuine people with heart and passion for what they are doing. Love it, will be back!

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States

04QR38jGxW5UxOgF8_WpoA.text: First time here and won't be my last. Probably my favorite poke spot out of the 3 I've tried in QC. They have generous portions and the price is reasonable. I love how they don't have a lot of extra charges on toppings and mix-ins. They literally only have 3 add-on charges for their toppings unlike other places that will charge you $1.50 for any additional items. Everything was made fresh and delectable! Definitely try it out, you won't be disappointed.

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States

xqB0VVGbRX0fvMkkYrliUA.text: King Fish Poke is by far one of the best, reasonably priced, poke spots in Charlotte. There is a wide variety of fresh ingredients and toppings to ensure you get exactly what you're looking for (I love the puffed rice, which adds an extra crunch). The staff was very nice and the atmosphere is ideal! I will definitely be back.

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States

CNHXr_-Uksir6IXK6kGUMg.text: Taste: 4.7 The rice was very tasty! The fish was fresh (do they have a pond behind the restaurant?)! One person in our party: "It was very good. I just felt like the shrimp tasted a little like a plastic bag. Spicy tuna was phenomenal. Best spicy tuna."  Service: 4.1 There was a mix-up with the mix-ins, and multitasking didn't work out well.   Presentation: 4.9 very organized. Colorful. Appetizing. Straightforward. Ingenious.   Atmosphere: 2.2 Not very pretty. Small. Not a lot of space. Loud music. Chairs, weird.

9qozA2nSsM36-2bx5r4KqQ.text: Very fresh and tasty. Loved the variety of toppings they provided. They still don't have some ingredients such as avocado and the king fish classic sauce but that's understandable considering it is their grand opening day. Overall, you won't regret trying it!

cLEKJd0gOmNShe5wM71lBQ.text: This place is just mind blowing. So fresh. Try it out. I got the pork and chicken bowl with both sushi and brown rice. All the toppings.

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States. This place is amazing. So fresh.

1jytDFCTOweymuSRh5-hEg.text: Very reasonable price for healthy and tasty food! Will definitely come back!!! You get to choose large bowl for 3 proteins and regular bowl for 2 proteins. Regardless of which size you choose, you get to pick unlimited vegetables and toppings!!! Having tried several poke bowl restaurants throughout Charlotte, I can say this is where you get the most bang for the buck!

vC1gJP-E-ZPJiXs_p-M97w.text: So, so unbelievably happy they opened a Poke bowl place... and it's right in the University area. The staff was really friendly and welcoming, I was warmly greeted as soon as I walked in. As for the poke bowl itself, they have two options: regular or large. The difference between the two is the amount of protein. For the regular you have a choice of two and for the large you have three. The portion size is definitely worth the price. The regular standing at 8.95 and the large being 10.95. All their fishes were super fresh and the variety of toppings and sauces is definitely what makes this place special. Their yuzu wasabi sauce is so refreshing & tasty. If you're looking for something fast, but a more healthy alternative.. definitely check this place out. I will definitely be back!

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States

EeXzJIicZfInhZN89wg_qg.text: Yooo this place is really good.  They give you 2 options of regular and large, and the portions are a good size as well - all at a decent/good price.  You can either choose from the menu or create your own bowl.  There's a variety of proteins, sauces, and toppings to add to your bowl as well.  The staff was also really cool and chill.  I had a lot of questions regarding the toppings and sauces, and they explained everything.  The Korean sauce (forgot what it's called) is !  The other sauces are good as well.  Definitely recommend!

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States

X4WKfToa4gnkKYrTUIS-kQ.text: This place is a hidden gem. The staff is super friendly and attentive, the portions are generous, and the ingredients seem really fresh.

2xfpC92i4vfO10H_KjwuNQ.text: Yum this place is good. There is a ton of ingredients to pick from. I went with shrimp and tuna as protein and just piled on toppings. There are vegetarian options and they make a burrito style wrap too which I will try next time. This place is new, its clean and modern inside. I was impressed with my first poke bowl and visit. Recommend, Try it :)

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States

GlgdFPC-CUUQenF8s0lmKg.text: King Fish Poke offers poke rice bowls, salads and even sushi burritos! The restaurant is very clean and there are plenty of seats in two different sections of the restaurant.   The $10 large size poke bowl is plentiful and you get a large helping of your protein of choice. I ordered the Niner but substituted the regular tuna with spicy tuna and was also offered the opportunity to add some additional toppings. There are slightly less topping choices compared to other poke places I've visited but the yummy sauces make up for it. If you are unsure about what sauce you want (because we all know sauce is a very important decision) you can ask for a sauce sampler.

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States

pj8dFMuUe6lCT-3zjP1ilw.text: Very clean inside. Nice friendly service. Lots of toppings and reasonable prices for poke bowls. I liked the pictures of Hawaii and they have Hawaiian Sun drinks. Their Yuzu wasabi is good. Sadly, the spicy ahi and spicy crab had no taste. Still, the toppings were nice and fresh and the sauce was tasty.

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States

3MEAzwjPil3QS_JoXsVPqQ.text: What a great find. Wondered in after visiting another nearby restaurant only to find their were out of my favorite item. King Fish Poke really came through. "Welcome to King Fish" were the words we heard when we entered. We were not disappointed in the protein choices. All the fish looked extremely fresh. This is the first Poke joint that I've been to where they actually put all the ingredients (except for the rice/salad mix) in the same bowl and mix together. This is great!  Saves me the trouble when I sit down and might I add I make quite a mess when trying to do it myself. The restaurant is EXTREMELY clean. Their grade was a 98.5 at the time of our visit. We will definitely return.

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States

gboAaj1UyWlppoIfCyzr2A.text: I came here to treat some family and friends who were helping me move to lunch. I got food from here delivered to me one or two times on Postmates prior to actually visiting. It's very similar to Chipotle/Moe's/Blaze Pizza etc. where you have your food made for you along an assembly line. I got a regular sized poke bowl with tuna, tofu, and a bunch of other things mixed in. It was really fresh and delicious. The service was good as well. I'll definitely be back now that I live closer.

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States

FiMhgFi9uPuoNwz_xP7pOQ.text: Decent price for fresh ingredients. Our bowls had great flavor and you get a good portion too. We both created our own bowls and the staff was very helpful walking use through the line. They had a yelp check-in special for their green tea cheesecake, which we were hesitant about but ended up being delicious. We will def. come back!

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States

64LYGM3tMOKeAM-PDEiEFQ.text: By now, I've frequented a number of poke restaurants, so I'd like to think I have a baseline for what distinguishes the superior from the mediocre. Unfortunately, I believe King Fish falls into the latter category. Here's why:  1. The rice to toppings ratio is way way off. They use the plastic bowls here that are very deep so the servers end up filling a lot of the large bowl with rice, since you can't fill the obvious extra space with expensive toppings. So more rice is just jam packed in the bottom until the bowl doesn't look so empty. This makes for a very lopsided meal--totally not balanced. Even if you tried your best to portion out your fish and toppings so that you don't eat it all at the beginning, you will undoubtedly be left with a lot of extra rice that you can a) eat by itself... or b) throw away, which is just wasteful. I suggest King Fish get shallower bowls or something to combat this issue.  2. Although the base prices for King Fish are quite competitive and cheaper than I've seen at other places, I was less impressed after I found out they charge for staples that are usually free--including Kani Salad and seaweed salad! Upcharging for little things like that which are usually free add-ins left a bad taste in my mouth.  3. Finally, my husband got the Niner signature bowl and they told us they had no more mango..so the employee suggested mandarin oranges..which he later found out they also didn't have! This was on a Saturday afternoon for lunch..I could understand if it was late night weekday..but you don't have these key ingredients (mango..since it was listed in the signature niner) during your prime business hours? Hmm..  Anyways, I know they're new so hopefully these kinks will be addressed.

vGqzHBeA2ejBP3fGHFaWVg.text: Quick, clean and generous. I've been on a poke kick lately I've been to three places of this sort in the Charlotte area. All very similar, slightly different price points seemingly based on whether or not avocado is included or extra but it all ends up the same. For about $20, we had dinner for two. We each ordered the smaller of the two bowls and wrangled chopsticks around our bowls until our bellies were full. I would definitely come back here again when I'm craving a sushi-type dinner. Give them a try!

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States. Two regular bowls loaded with toppings, $22

F7QjnN0FPeduW4KlqumIJw.text: I order the Niner since it was packed with a lot of ingredients and added in crab n seaweed salad for extra fees.  I thought it was be so much like sushi but in a bowl.  It was pretty bland even with the white sauce. The other sauce option were spicy I was told and I decide to pass.  Someone else would probably like it if you're on a health kick or like raw foods.  I thought I would try the burrito on the next time but I'm not into Poke' at this point.

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States. Niner with crab salad and seaweed salad added

7RKDm3qkPW57-BBxks6bBw.text: Best poke in Charlotte hands down! I been coming here at least once a week since they opened in March. The food is always fresh and delicious! The staff their are always friendly and helpful. The 2 owners are great guys! I always create my own bowl but they also have signature to choose from if you don't want to create your own. This is a must try place in Charlotte. Also I believe they made yelp 2018 top 10!

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States

O7Gz1wK-kZ3TP4htoYgIxw.text: I'm so happy to have found this place!  Really friendly, helpful staff and bright, clean restaurant.  Of course, best of all was the great poke bowl I got.  The tuna and salmon were super fresh and the fish sauce(?) that was suggested was really, really good!  If you like poke bowls, go give this place a try!

6okaXMjVGi3sCdHCKO9J8g.text: Fantastic poke!  I got the Niner bowl and it was amazing!  I'm just visiting the area but will be craving this in the future. I will likely go there again tomorrow to try their sushi burrito. Fast service. Fresh ingredients.  Definitely worth it!

vatzH8QeH0tuNk9m7P9New.text: This is gonna be our new spot when we are craving poke fish! Best one so far hands down compared to the other 3 we went to in Charlotte.  This is why: 1) For a poke bowl at $8.95 (Regular-2 proteins) and $10.95 (Large-3 proteins) with the amount of protein you get, prices are very reasonable!! Heck my girlfriend couldn't even finish hers and she got a regular 2 protein size. Not to mention they're very delicious and I finished every bite!  2) You get option of creating your own bowl, sushi burrito or salad having them create a signature bowl.   3) The restaurant is clean, aesthetic, and has a minimalistic feel with a welcoming feel.  Nonetheless, try this place out when you're hungry for poke! You won't regret it! You'll come in hungry, and leaving fully satisfied!

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States. Tuna and Salmon bowl with extra toppings!
Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States. The tuna and salmon bowl.

_QF-n8COGFl7KePmBahyWw.text: I might have to eat here on a weekly basis. Build your own poke bowl! #1 - pick your base (rice or lettuce - I pick brown rice), #2 - pick your proteins (I pick the salmon and tuna), #3 - pick your add-ons (so many options!), #4 - pick your sauce (six to choose from), and #5 - pick your toppings (I always add seafood salad). Eat in (nice bright clean space) or take out. So fresh and delicious.

yf08mzDa0jKYMxiUT0yYsg.text: very fresh ingredients... went in on their first day of opening and it was BOGO... what better deal than that? maybe because i am from nyc and never had good service before but the people working there was really nice. A+ on food and on the services. their sauce is amazingly yummy

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States

kk2xRpIRGbQdUpMtUiC8Rg.text: stopped by here for lunch and was looking for something other than a salad or sandwich. i have been to a few poke places in and out of charlotte but this may be my new favorite clt poke bar.  food: it is a build your own which i really liked. this way i had a better idea of all my options and put the weird things i like together. also the fact that you get two meats was awesome. they didn't skimp on the servings and everything was fresh fresh fresh! i got the regular size and it was very filling! pricewise, i thought this was one of the better priced poke spots i've been to.  service: i told them it was my first time and all the guys were super helpful and i didn't feel rushed when picking from my options. they let me try the sauce before and went out of their way to make sure everything was to my liking. good dudes making good food.  ambience: it was very clean and a totally instagram-worthy spot! it is on the smaller side but during the day i don't think seating would be an issue.

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States. ahi tuna and spicy crab. avo is always extra but load up on everything else!
Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States

aVhJFYASLTumjDnQjzAkoQ.text: The poke bowls are amazing! Very simple setup and a lot of custom bowl options. Came in because I had a craving, will be returning again.

LmXYCBkL-VIY4dxPGHHTXQ.text: I've been coming to this place for a couple of months now and haven't been disappointed. They are consistent with the flavor, amount and service. I love how fresh everything is. It's a great amount of tasty food for a reasonable price. Highly recommended!

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States

fVWbsTP-A_lfOoKMnw2Vtg.text: I came here for my first time. After my husband and his work colleagues raves about this place. And it did not disappoint!   Excellent quality items, too saucy for my taste but I will ask for less next time. A suggestion to add eel sauce to the menu? That would be delicious!   Customer service was good, she was extremely polite and welcoming.   Bathrooms and dining area were kept clean. Will return again.

id91TvEjIA81HwFV9rcczA.text: It was my first time in and I wasn't sure how the process worked. The lady lead me through all the options and was thoughtful enough to let me try before putting it in my bowl. So fresh and everything you'd want in a poke bowl. I will be a return customer for sure. Only thing I wish was that the crab salad was an option for the meats and not an additional topping that cost extra. Other than that I was very pleased!

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States

VdSFI_QjlnoQuArfNo4gmQ.text: Favorite lunch restaurant. You get great poke bowl here and you are in and out in a minute  perfect for office lunch hours

ute7s0k5GOUL4JTLX_rXaw.text: Stopped in here for a healthy-ish lunch and was excited to try my hand at the "create your own" type of bowl. I started with brown rice (I'd read on another review that they give too much rice so I asked for less than normal - which was still a lot of rice!) and chose tuna and salmon as my protein. I then added carrots, cabbage, edamame, jalapenos, cucumbers, seaweed salad, cilantro, green onions, tempura flakes, and spicy mayo.   All in all - I thought it was tasty and fresh. My only complaint would be the lack of protein. Compared to the ratio of rice and toppings, it just wasn't enough fish. With that being said, the flavors were great, as was the price. I still want to try some other poke spots in CLT but will definitely come back here (and ask for a bigger serving of fish) in the future.

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States. Poke Bowl with brown rice, tuna, salmon and all kinds of stuff on top

ieb4Zp92Hsl7NzGnA8evYw.text: Since King Fish opened I have been a loyal customer, seriously, my friends and I eat here at least once every week. Up until today I have never had any issues, the food has always been excellent and the service is great. Unfortunately today, I placed an order through Doordash and upon receiving my food I noticed something was wrong. While eating I found what appears to be a WORM in my poke bowl. I was hoping that it was just an odd looking piece of seaweed but when I cut it open it was clearly not. I contacted DoorDash and they were able to give me a full refund and said they will be contacting the store to inform them of the issue.

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States. Worm in poke bowl
Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States. Worm in poke bowl

_pG7G01O3EZpnpQzvylkxw.text: The last time I came home to visit back in February (Charlotte), I came across this spot and let me tell you, this was my first time trying poke bowl and sushi burito. I love sushi anyway but the Poke` bowl and sushi burrito was amazing and so refreshing. Ever since then, I have been finding spots in GA to get some poke` and found one spot in Hapeville, GA. I will be back the next time I come home.

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States. Poke` bowl with spicy tuna, spicy salmon, crab salad and all of my favorite toppings. This was a large and it was a lot!! So good!!
Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States. This is my sushi burito. I had spicy tuna, crab salad and spicy salmon i believe but it was so filling and delicious!

JeHRt2-mxQOdIRSeKqfNUA.text: I needed something different so I came here, and I wasn't disappointed. I stalked the other reviews to decide what I should get. I opted for the surf and turf salad without the turf, extra surf and had them put in almost all of the other extras.   I inhaled the salad when I got back home. It really was a great salad, and next time maybe I'll actually try the tuna or salmon. Everything was fresh and the people who worked there were very helpful. The place is clean and I also tried an Asian soda. It is hard to describe. The flavor wasn't overpowering. It was just good. And if you ask the guy who works there to describe it, he'll likely tell you the same.

GJ4-7Vqc-wgDb31GyI2VOQ.text: This place was delicious. I got a sushi burrito and it was amazing. In it I got salmon, ahi tuna, mango cucumbers, and carrots. All of those ingredients were fresh and tasted great. They have multiple sauces but I just got the King Fish Classic and it had a little bit of a kick but wasn't too spicy. They didn't have tea which was a bit of bummer but other than that this place was great. I would highly suggest going here.

eP3X96KjzXCsBsnF_wSO_g.text: Sushi fans, give this place a try.   The subway method has finally been applied to sushi! I just recently discovered Poke places and what exactly that means, and I am quite excited to find out we have one of these so close now. This place is wonderful, the quality is top notch, the proportions are gigantic, and the price is surprisingly low, considering what you get. My wife and I could easily split a bowl or one of their massive sushi burritos. (Pic is of her holding /half/ of her burrito. Definitely try this place out if you like sushi.

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States

ox-MakUkrZOYw20p_LeBHw.text: Omggggggg. This place is friggin awesome. I would come here all the time if i were a local. Sadly, not. Incredible price for the size! They do NOT skimp out on scooping you fresh sashimi and spicy tuna. Super friendly staff and also super clean, which is a win esp because they handle raw fish.

V2XhU9cjcKWaT82r-KyUeg.text: What sets King Fish Poke apart, in my opinion, is the pricing.  $8.95 for a regular bowl, which includes 2 proteins and a wide selection of toppings.  The funny thing is, my friends got a large bowl (for $10.95, which is still a great deal - 3 proteins), and our bowls were the same size.  They even looked pretty much the same, with all the content inside.  I understand the protein is the costliest item on the menu, and looks are deceiving, because it's just a few more scoops of fish, but I'm just saying you can be satisfyingly full with a regular bowl if you choose your toppings well!  I got a regular bowl with salmon and tuna, and the fish tasted pretty good, considering the price point.  The toppings all seemed fresh, and I thoroughly enjoyed my bowl.  The space is clean and well-kept, and the service was friendly and prompt.  Overall, King Fish is a great bang-for-your-buck option when it comes to poke / sushi, in my opinion.

CpLn8d95lmXYzYuPPI8zpg.text: We were visiting family in Charlotte and had to stop in for dinner.  My wife and I both got bowls and were stuffed when we left!  The staff was helpful with pairing our choices and the results were fantastic!  We'll be back.

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States

UDZFOU65ThxANsH_WItS3A.text: I love this place so much! I eat here at least once a week. I get a build your own bowl. The food is always fresh and the service is pretty good!

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States

nRrssBsYs5Mj1nzHb3jSIA.text: With the blue rail extension and now this new Poke spot, it looks like the University area is comin' in hot!  King fish is located in the Total Wine/Ashley Furniture shopping center off of WT Harris. It's located at the top, right near Jimmy John's.  It's got a very sleek, modern feel with not too many tables crammed in there. The menu is displayed on large screens right above the prep station.   This is another Chipotle-style, choose your own ingredients. You can start off with either a salad, bowl (with either brown or white sushi-style rice), or burrito. For my first visit, I chose a regular-size poke bowl with sushi rice. You are then given a choice of two scoops of protein: shrimp, salmon, tuna, or chicken, tofu.  I went with two scoops of tuna and then proceeded to have my bowl topped with cucumber slices, matchstick carrots, diced green onion, edamame, red cabbage, jalapeno. You are then able to pick which sauce you would like added, I went with gochujang because I love heat. I asked for it on the side but, normally, they would throw into the bowl to make sure all ingredients are coated. Their gochu is/was delicious. I will happily have them douse my poke bowl with that sauce on my next visit.  There are also extra additions you can have added to your bowl/burrito, etc such as avocado ($1.25 extra), ginger slices, wasabi, shredded nori, and so on.  If you're not in the mood to make that many decisions, you can choose one of their pre-made combinations that are listed on their menu. For as much as you get, the price is VERY reasonable. Total for my poke bowl came to $9.60.   I'm happy to have this place in the area and will be back!

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States. Choices of protein: salmon, tuna, shrimp, chicken
Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States. Pokè bowl to-go
Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States. Close up of those layers

XSrZgI7akWBrts3j7gZY-Q.text: Very clean feel to the place, large portions and an extremely friendly staff.  I saw that others said the large is $10, its $10.95, but no big deal.  Still a good deal for that amount of fresh fish and other food.  That said, the fresh fish....  I'm not quite sure how fresh the "spicy" versions of each meat are, nor am I sure if the crab is actually crab, or is faux-crab which is normally spelled like krab.  Anyhow, I didn't order any of those things, just stuck with the tuna and salmon, which was great.  Another side note, the back door didn't work, not sure if that is legal or not, especially in a place with a kitchen.  I'll be back for sure.  I love this new trend in places like this popping up over the country and this is my favorite one for the north Charlotte area for sure.

NuVquHbNLtEzF_Smejzdmw.text: This is the cheapest poke bowl place in town I've come across.  $8.95 for 2 proteins and unlimited toppings!  You cannot beat that!  The service was great, they offer samples if you're unsure about a topping or sauce.    Everything looked of great quality - the Tuna tasted like it had been out a bit, but not awful enough to deter me from a future visit.  I got a sushi burrito and a bowl. The burrito  turned out to be a bit smaller than I expected. I had so many toppings I'm not sure how - but I was still hungry after.  So I was glad I got a bowl too.    I like to get my poke bowls over greens (salad) - it's definitely a game changer if you're looking to refrain from rice.  Overall, I feel like the ingredient prep will get better as they settle in their routine. Glad the University area got a poke bowl spot!  UPDATE: I've been back twice in June/July 2018 and they've definitely got their routine packed, every protein/topping looks and tastes fresh - and the customer service has been nothing but amazing!

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States

kETDONGptsNY0Ir4knxjhw.text: Had a Poke bowl today and it was the best I've had in Charlotte yet. Really loved it. Great and fresh options. A++++

QKHotVmsE_vrdRDMZJHxkg.text: Love this place. I haven't had poke elsewhere in Charlotte, but this compares to any of the other places I've been outside Hawaii. They are super friendly, patient, and the food is great. Prices are fair. I don't even begrudge them the price increase recently. I'll be back.

Wjo_GCqCcR8PEdSgrAU3-Q.text: Good selection, fresh ingredients and friendly service. Can't ask for much more.   I will say that the wasabi dressing when liberally applied could make your head feel like a candle that's just been lit so mix that with something. Overall delicious.

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States. Large salad in front and medium rice bowl. Both tasty

EoKBfeSyQl8gO7EQ-241CQ.text: I became a poke lover since I first tried poke in this restaurant! Building my own poke bowl is always an exciting thing. Everything was fresh(especially the fish and shrimp!!) and the texture of the rice(sushi/brown) was very pleasant. The selection and quality of mix-ins,toppings and flavors makes this place apart from other poke places.(try their King Fish Classic, also I personally love Korean Gochujang-so good and if youre a spice lover be sure to check it)  Service is always good no matter they're super busy or not. Price also reasonable! Definitely worth stopping by and trying if you're in Charlotte. Highly recommended!

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States

njDEfolduYsl7Nj_RthPCg.text: I went with the large "Friday" and added jalapenos and avocado over salad. It's a lot of food, and really fresh and good. Great vibe from the people making it for me too!  I love this place. Bright, fresh and fast.

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States

oQ4JaU9mdKEDANng7HHjeQ.text: Love this place! The food is awesome! The place is clean! The atmosphere is chill. The service is always amazing!

011G635Es99g2ynqxvl1Rw.text: I am hooked on Poke bowls!  This spot is awesome, and close to work which is even better.  I come here for lunch to get the large poke bowl with brown rice and a mix of of the ahi tuna & spicy tuna.  The options they have for mix ins and toppings are great.  The wasabi aioli is the THE BEST.  Top it off with ginger and some avocado, and you've got yourself a delicious healthy meal.  I'm definitely addicted to this spot and will be a frequent customer going forward.  Highly recommended!

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States

upSsWYZ_jc3937SuQYhVpw.text: Hands-down, the BESTT poke place in Charlotte. I've been to a handful of other poke places and none compares to this one right here. The food is the star and the sauce is the soul!!! ITS BOTH SO DELICIOUS! I love love it. It is pricey, especially with the recently price raise FYI. But it's a nice treat and I don't mind paying a little more for the quality you get here.  And I LOVE the service. Always receive nice and welcoming services!

J_n3TcYopvhdSDjXvhbEXg.text: Uhhh yum seaweed salad!! It was a great meal with my friend when we were both disappointed with a restaurant week dinner and we looked more forward to this hahahaha   I got salmon as my protein, some mango, cucumbers, seaweed salad, some corn, Panko, some other crunchy stuff and sushi rice! It was so good with a great blend of flavors! Affordable price around $12 since seaweed salad was additional $2 but oh so worth it!   The salmon was just so-so in my opinion and don't taste the freshest but overall the bowl was rlly tasty! They workers were super nice too because I came close to closing time!   Parking is seems pretty easy on the side or right in front! There's a huge lot downstairs as well in case it's crowded.

29lU4BVOT67Ycc2B_shjew.text: I had heard good things about King Fish and was excited when I was in the area around lunchtime.   I took the opportunity and off I went.   The service was really good.  Being my first time here, they talked me through the process.   Didn't really need it as I had been to a poke place in the past.     I really felt  that I got a lot for my money.  I did the make your own and got three scoops of protein.  I was really full after my meal.    All in all it was a great visit and I will definitely return.

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States

MABS-QK0U8ypVrx_Dixbwg.text: Quick service, easy to get to, and the food was outstanding! Lots of great ingredients to mix and match. I highly recommend this place and am already looking forward to returning

9jK63HxXqq2slaN142-qFg.text: Being a recent convert to Charlotte and major foodie... I am always looking for healthy and sexy food options. King Poke did not disappoint and you can build your own. Next time I will have more sauce added to keep it from being dry.   The place is super clean and the staff is quiet and nice and very helpful. Since it was my first time I put so many things in that bowl that it came up to 14.00 but I am not complaining as it was yummy and beautiful. And did I mention you get a choice of brown or white rice or salad.  Next time salad Poke Bowl you will move mine....

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States

y0pFNFmu00lc9HqN79Janw.text: I'm so glad I tried KFP during my visit to North Carolina. Thanks to yelp, my friend was craving poke and this place showed up at the top of the list.   This place is very welcoming and has a nice interior. Everything looked really clean and the workers were very friendly.  I got the chicken bowl and my friend got the poke bowl. It was soooo good, especially since this is a poke place. My friend loved the poke bowl. It came with sushi rice, salmon, mango, orange, sesame seed, avocado, green onions, sriracha aioli, and onions crisps. She said the fish was really fresh and tasted delicious. It's a great portion size too.  I highly recommend KF Poke if you're in the area!

yOqbLybJihZDTq5X7BBAfQ.text: First time here and i have to say there is nothing you preparing your own SUSHI BOWL !!!!! I have attached the menu for creat your own bowl and they also prepare signature dishes BUT why when you can have a SUSHI BOWL!!! Honestly i was a little nervous because I thought it was not going to be good but i was wrong these guys have fresh fish and toppings my choice was: Sushi bowl with brown rice, proteins were salmon and spicy tuna, then i added the sauces which were wasabi and also a sriracha chipotle sauce then i added the toppings, sea weed salad, masago, pickled ginger, green onions aaaaand wasabi! Last thing is the crunch my choice was: garlic crisps and to top it off tempura puffs. Overall place is clean, customer service is great and of course the food is great. Definitely and great place for a quick bite for lunch and dinner. I even got a souvenir (free sticker)  thanks guys!!!

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States. Make your own menu
Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States. Signature menu
Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States. Sushi  bowls

X0Kc0Xk6N7XYQIFu_vlPtQ.text: I've been going back and forth on how I'm going to write this review and I'm finally going to do it.  Short and to the point, I've always been impressed with the food even though I had a severe allergic reaction on my last visit here. This is the second or third time I've had a severe reaction to food and let me be clear, this is in NO WAY King Fish Poke's fault! It turns out that after scheduling an appointment with an allergy specialist and getting a full panel test done, I found out that my body reacts very poorly to sesame! King Fish is very good at labeling their bowls and one of the ingredients in the bowl I got here was black sesame. Upon doing some research, black sesame has a significantly higher concentration of oil and proteins that cause my reaction!  Again, I want to make sure everyone understands that if anything, King Fish helped me realize that I needed to get this food allergy figured out!  Aside from all that, my bowl was delicious (I don't react instantly to my food allergies apparently, it took an hour before any of the effects kicked in). Their fish is extremely fresh and toppings are top notch. I also noted that the restaurant, while very minimal, was spotless and squeaky clean.  I can't wait to return and try something else, probably without Black Sesame, haha! Oddly enough, I can have regular sesame and although I am still sensitive to it, I'd have to be having a really bad day (exposure and/or buildup to other things I'm allergic to) to have a full-on reaction.  Probably the oddest positive review I've ever written but still positive nonetheless. Thanks again King Fish for the awesome fresh food! I'm almost certain the next visit will be a five star experience.

tIdHpTkA1iRtjvNqZYMkbQ.text: This place was such a great stumble upon! I was visiting Charlotte to do some back to school shopping and was looking for a quick lunch stop and I am sooo glad that I found King Fish Poke. I am pretty sure it was pretty obvious I had never been there and the server was super patient and helpful! At one point I even picked a sauce that I thought I might like and he suggested combining that sauce with another to really bring out the flavors and he was on the money! The food was so fresh and tasty! I really wish they had this place in the Raleigh/Cary/Apex area because I would frequent it OFTEN!

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States. Ahi tuna create your own bowl

QlhstZB2OmB1ioBBGfOMkg.text: This place is great! Lots of choices for protein and mix ins, delicious homemade sauces and friendly and attentive team members. Staff offered to let us sample sauces and made recommendations. The facility is clean, bright, and modern. Also these bowls are huge for the price! A regular salad bowl will be two meals for me.

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States

biDhOqaNTijBxKkKhAnQAg.text: I've been to a few poke spots on the East Coast but none in Hawaii so I can only tell you that this one is consistent with the themes I've seen and might not be close to traditional.  Poke is similar to the assembly line sort of thing that's been popularized and commoditized with Subway and Chipotle. You start at one end of the line, pick your base, and as you go down the rest of the line, add toppings or mix-ins until you're at the register. Easy and simple.  King Fish Poke offers salads and burritos and bowls with a handful of different proteins including fresh salmon and tuna, toppings including seaweed salad and cucumber and carrots and edamame, then add some sauce with a flavor. It's easy, it feels super healthy and it's delicious.  As I'm working my way through a keto-friendly diet, I stuck to the salad base adding salmon and tuna with cucumber and cilantro and red cabbage, topping it with the wasabi aioli that was rather spicy. A big bowl of food and very delicious.  The shop is super clean and the guys working the line are friendly and speedy.  [Review 10249 overall, 12 of 2019.]

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States. King Fish Poke in Charlotte, NC
Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States. My completed salad bowl from King Fish Poke
Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States. Assembly line at King Fish Poke

udC15yRM-uNdhPCrXCC_qA.text: Refreshingly keto-friendly (sans rice) coupled with helpful and friendly staff.  What's not to like?  I announced myself as a newbie, was scooped up and guided through the line up.  Nice.  I settled on a lettuce base, spicy tuna and shrimp as my proteins.  Everything was very fresh.  I think you'll like it, too.  All for under $10 including tax.  Cool.  Looking to expand your culinary experience without breaking the bank?  Give this place a whirl.

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States. Salad-based poke bowl.  210 calories and 5 net carbs,$8.95.

mqzMP_b_HRhDwswfZmhhFw.text: I arrived during lunch time on a weekday. King Fish Poke is located in a shopping center. Plenty of parking available shared by multiple businesses.   The space is big, clean, open, and bright. Lots of seating. The staff greeted me when I approached the counter. I was intrigued that they not only offer poke bowls, but also sushi burritos. I let the staff know that I couldn't decide between the two. She asked how hungry I was and I replied, "very" so she suggested a bowl. You have the option of creating your own bowl/burrito or choosing from one of their King Fish Signatures. I went with her suggestion and ordered a bowl.  Step 1: Choose your size (Regular: 2 proteins $8.95 or Large: 3 proteins $10.95) and base (choice of white rice, brown rice, and lettuce/spring mix. You can choose half and half). Step 2: Choose your protein (salmon, ahi tuna, spicy tuna, tofu, shrimp, chicken, and char siu pork). Step 3: Choose your mix (unlimited - sweet onion, cucumber, edamame, seaweed, red cabbage, jalapeno, cilantro, mango, mandarin orange, and carrots). Step 4: Choose your flavor (shrimp sauce, wasabi aioli, sriracha aioli, King Fish Classic, yuzu wasabi, and Korean gochujang). Step 5: Choose your toppings (sesame seeds, green onion, wasabi, ginger, masago, seaweed salad, crab salad, and avocado - some for upcharge). Step 6: Choose your crunch (onion crisps, garlic crisps, shredded nori, and toasted rice puffs).  I ordered a regular bowl $8.95 + crab salad ($1.25), seaweed salad ($.49), and lots of mixes and toppings. The regular was more than enough for me. I took about half to go. It was fresh and flavorful! I will have to come back and try their sushi burrito next time.

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States. Regular bowl $8.95 + crab salad ($1.25) and seaweed salad ($.49)

i48sW6_KXXPV1553HR0RCA.text: LOVE this place - I had never had a Poke Bowl in burrito form but it was AWESOME!! We will definitely be back for more!!

KSvO7aj_8HiDriozRfj8GQ.text: Had the opportunity to try this place while I was in town for training. $10 for a large is a great price considering it's usually $14/$15 where I'm from. I built my own bowl with sushi rice and I absolutely loved the rice. My usual spot only offers plain white rice but their sushi rice totally kicked it up a notch! It was sweet and tangy and very flavorful and really enhanced all of the ingredients I added.   I got the salmon which was really fresh and flavorful. They had a wide variety of toppings and were certainly not skimping on their scoops! I got fresh veggies like edamame, onions, avocado and cilantro. I got a side of crab salad, seaweed salad and pineapple. My only thing was that their options included mango which is my favorite to add, but both times that I went they had none available and only had pineapple. All in all, it was a great experience. The portions were huge, definitely had enough left over for two lunches and the ingredients were fresh and tasty.

3lCK0gu6hP78x9M2zdWg5Q.text: This has become a regular spot for me and my family. It started out slow after a misunderstanding the first time. I have to say the food is fresh the service is very warming. I am in the military and even though they do not offer any discounts their prices are very reasonable. It is always a lot of food that is healthy. My best place in Charlotte.

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States. Love this place
Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States. Food is always on point
Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States. Poke Salad

R09AWlH5cFRZi1JcjX2pTA.text: Better than other spots I've been to. Great portions and prices and options. Clean and good service but the glass between customers and the food is awkwardly high so it's hard to hear each other LOL

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States. things are coming together nicely over here

HcqFDI1jjPNadlNEFOh9ew.text: Love the poke here. Plenty of choices and nice clean environment. Definitely recommended

M_lfppiZTbmJNYAGZQgv9g.text: Best. Food. Hands down.  I came here with friends after looking for a good sushi spot.  They don't have traditional sushi but instead have these wonderful poke bowls that are delicious.  I'm pretty picky so I wasn't expecting to absolutely love this place.  I can't describe it but basically you choose what you want inside your bowl -then enjoy! I had shrimp, crab, avocado, and some other veggies.  I need to go back here.  They should advertise themselves more bc I never would have come here if not for going by mistake.  Eat here and thank me later!

v2aRhmTWzjG9OmtBnf3QPQ.text: Why haven't we been here before?!?! We're always looking for fresh, healthier options to dine and we've found one! The food was fresh and the restaurant was clean. We'll definitely be back!!

8RpoO216OW2-IaknKbY16w.text: I feel this place has reached the pinnacle of food technology. The sushi burrito is my new favorite thing. I wish I lived closer because I would definitely be visiting more often. They have excellent food and courteous staff.

GHvaJp68Zut_Br5Q82uQqQ.text: You get so much food for $10, and it's all so good. Staff is super friendly and approachable. Indoor seating is extremely well decorated. Love this place

Mh7BUFGrT_rakaRl0_jZ2Q.text: Fish is fresh! Try the pork before they raise the price. Pork is must have! Clean space, nice people. For sure will go again

LR1vjcfDS_BbHjSrzCeFqw.text: I love poke and I've been trying to find a good place in Charlotte. Omg great bowl! Fresh, awesome flavors! Quick service! You guys have something good going! I will be a regular!

vJjERnLckOjtM4uajSqM9g.text: This is by far the best fish/sushi bowl I've come across in QC. With very reasonable prices and plenty healthy natural ingredients choices, I can easily put together a quick yet satisfying luncheon for myself. Besides the unlimited toppings offer, my favorite is the King Fish Classic sauce was made exclusively savory and palatable. It gives you that creamy lustrous taste of the Shrimp Sauce with a hint of pungent YuZu Wasabi flavor. Place like this definitely deserves a praise and five stars!

9-f2Jsp7Xb8wxbKYlvWDPQ.text: Definitely going to be a regular! The franchise is clean, simple, yet elegant. The food is freshly made with a variety of options to choose from. The staff and owners are friendly with excellent customer service. Highly recommend!

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States. A regular, King Fish Poke with an unlimited amount of mix-ins to choose from.

iVqgQFABhbAMy9w0XUNiVw.text: Probably the best poke here in Charlotte! Friendly workers, fresh ingredients and the price is very reasonable. Will definitely be a regular here from now on.

hl5FiIBcW-0BWPy5XyeqrQ.text: This place is an amazing place to go if you enjoy sushi bowls and sushi burritos. I recently visited myself and was IMMEDIATELY satisfied with the customer service, the food, the price, and the overall atmosphere of the restaurant. The employees will treat you with the utmost respect and the portion size of the food are VERY generous for the price. I HIGHLY recommend this place to anyone and everyone that enjoys sushi items such as salmon, tuna, spicy salmon, spicy tuna, etc. I will definitely be a regular here.

iPudV_ugT6RFcamzfDyBAA.text: First experience with pokie bowls was in Texas. So I was super excited about this. It's a cute little spot and the staff were super friendly. Food was great. Love the whole freshness of sushi in a bowl. I was only disappointed in the serving size. If you are new to the idea. This place is worth a visit.

photos.caption: Photo of King Fish Poke - Charlotte, NC, United States

ekZmilP4EfocjR4g7N7i5g.text: Amazing food and the staff was great also.  Loved the layout of their menu, multiple bowl sizes. The seaweed salad was great.

pP_9vunhQop5n67UM6vxvQ.text: I love this place!  Fabulous fresh ingredients and extremely helpful staff.  I would highly recommend it!

ztIJZf4_BaIhX8EQqvpmDg.text: My poke bowl was amazing.The portion, quality, and customer service was amazing. Come and check this place out.

04t7SiqqEOjQF2-4gBTKJw.text: Great customer service and very fresh food. Atmosphere is clean and modern. First time coming and will be a regular going forward!

955e91mnH7DWtCD8ZtDB9A.text: I stopped in today because I love sushi and anything associated! The owners were warm welcoming and accommodating! The vibe of the place reminds me of being in a modern tropical costal town. Simple design and nice light neutral color. I ordered a salmon and shrimp sushi burrito with fillings like cilantro, onions, avocado, shredded crab, cucumber red cabbage carrots even garlic crunchy flakes and it was the best and freshest tasting! I was allowed to taste the sauce before ordering to be sure I knew what I liked which were all of them. I was so focused on eating I didn't even take photo guys seriously. I think im going back for dinner I was extremely satisfied and would recommend King Fish Poke to any fresh seafood lovers and don't worry if your bestie doesn't like seafood they can get veggie or even chicken ( I KNOW !!!!!!!!) My drink was a fountain ginger ale with strawberry syrup super refreshing! Thanks for the wonderful experience and even better food!

1eCCh1PT5Eki3pHbNjs1GQ.text: So good and refreshing! One of my favorite restaurants. Food is filling but doesn't make you feel bad after eating it. I recommend getting one of the poke bowls!

MxNOAhUOL_PHpuXDkAjLNw.text: King Fish Poke is one of my new favorites!  I am so pleased that it is a convenient location and after I leave the gym and grab a meal I do not feel bad LOL.  The rice bowls are fresh, the fish is fresh and delicious and so are the combinations. The rice is perfectly cooked and everyone is very nice and helpful who works there.  Many times I will get half rice and half salad to make it even healthier.  Since it was recommended to me, I eat there at least twice a week.  I also love that I can get delivery to Harrisburg with Postmates!!

HrmOyEKP-1mJf2jHtQFw2A.text: So good!!!  Not what I had expected but it delighted me.  I had the burrito with tuna and salmon.  The fish was tender and tasty. I loved that you could add as many toppings as you wanted.  Staff was friendly and helpful.  I absolutely recommend this place to anyone looking for a healthy and delicious option.

QM65nQBQWRL_Lph1J5TDtQ.text: Raw fish of Chipotle. A little bit pricy but it's totally worth it. I love the sauces they use. I feel full and healthy walking out of this place every time.

3MIXv0UHH0Qe-_0VbrNCWw.text: I tried King Fish Poke for the first time recently and it was very good. It was tasty and different. Would highly recommend!

jQl1g4zsABMmuStaCyEMzw.text: My wife and I stop by for lunch here yesterday after a good bike ride, and I can tell you that the food was unbelievably good and felt very refreshing after a bike ride. I glad that she found it and I look forward to stopping by in the future for some more protein rich lunches. Also, I thought the price was very good for the the amount of food we received. We got the large three's scoop protein version with brown rice and we had enough food for lunch and dinner.

VrGYNmwOVS6f6KCPEXEV7Q.text: This place is great. I'm pretty picky about my sushi and King Fish Poke exceeded my expectations. The quality is one of the best I've had for any sushi place. The staff was extremely friendly and helpful. I may become a regular...

tLJd6a3v8meDOPgA1VafHQ.text: Awesome atmosphere and great service. Staff was super nice and the food was awesome. I got the regular sized bowl and I'm taking a full bowl home even after I ate. The amount of food you get for what you pay is awesome. Try it out!!

3c-44w1_EtAVT83UtesOTA.text: This is my new favorite place in the University area. They have so many options and choices. Will be visiting often.

OWm22mUYXTUN3ZJNE2ui3Q.text: First time having poke, and it is so good!  This place is great - super clean, great food, and great service!  Can't wait to go back!

sl6zgWsvMOArPc-QRtATuA.text: Today was my second time trying King Fish Poke and it certainly did not disappoint! My dad and I both chose to make our own bowls and the result was a filling, delicious meal that left me completely satisfied. We both chose salmon and ahi tuna as our proteins and the fish was very fresh, as was the avocado that I added to my bowl. The sauces are amazing, and their King Fish Classic sauce is a must try! Also, I love that they offer fruits as toppings! All in all, it's definitely a 5/5 experience!

s8m5sVD5_2z9jBu_73Dkfg.text: Delicious, low priced, fresh, great atmosphere and a very friendly staff/owner.  Highly recommend going here and checking them out!

YVYBh6RL7fFo9qSLU6_3Dw.text: I searched out this place after seeing it on the Yelp top 100 list for Charlotte. It was delicious. Good options, good portions

MjdjMWqTyrW56LHhtRAJgw.text: This place just became my go-to spot for Poke. Moving from San Diego, I had a hard time finding a similar Poke experience but this is it! Everything is on point, the price is fair, the rice is cooked well and served in large quantity, the fish is fresh, the toppings options are good, and the sauces have their own twist. Drove two hours from Anderson, SC just to fulfill my poke craving yesterday. To anyone living in Charlotte, this place should definitely be on your restaurant rotation.

56RUf4a9JFJrDGjrJLC8Ig.text: The servers were really helpful in helping understand the ordering style if it's your first time. The food was really fresh and yummy! Been twice so far and was not disappointed. Loved the options and the sauce choices!

VDFpadSq83JUtnsMsLgLlg.text: This place is my new home. The fish was fresh and the staff was SO cheerful even with me coming in 15 minutes before closing time. I got the smaller sized salad and enjoyed it. I love spicy food so the spicy tuna and spicy salmon were right up my alley. I can't wait to come back. Is tomorrow too soon? The staff even asked me what I liked? And they really wanted feedback. I'll be back.

cJw63iR-_zc2yZ0t1TPpLA.text: Everything was delicious! Food was fresh and packed with flavor. Definitely recommend.

4qNxILZPvouhfiUcH74vPQ.text: First time trying Poke. My sister and I got a sushi burrito! The service was great and the owner greeted us and asked us if we thought the food was good. He was super nice. I love the sauces! My favorite is the sriracha aioli and king fish sauce. The salmon and tuna was super fresh. The decor inside is simple, modern and nice. Definitely would come back and try the poke bowl.

kcHjLKRaDGzq4yoihRWjjg.text: Absolutely AMAZING! I didn't know what Poke was until today when I looked this place up trying to find a place to eat. It was fresh, delicious, high quality fish, great serving size, and great customer service! I'm am so happy I found this gem of a place. Will be back for sure!

mXSDFq3U6naKEFWerKExxw.text: Just a wonderful product however you want.  Totally would go back for the same for dinner.   Lovely place, nice people and the ability to create what you want.   It all tastes good together, just get the things you like.

BeYPd_nYEFRLqV2bZyHfxg.text: Great place with great options!! The proteins are fresh, the ingredients are top notch. Clean location with great customer service. I will be back!

vsZua_VQb1yUi4bHnGz_IQ.text: I come here for lunch a couple times a week because it's THAT good and fresh. The yuzu salmon bowl is incredible!!! I recommend this place to everyone.

nN0RUgo49_qKId48V8aMDg.text: Amazing!  Had the Spicy Tuna and Salmon bowl...  Everything was super clean and staff was friendly and helpful.  Portions were very generous and everything tasted fresh. Will be back often!!!

BPmsz9DmfAL-kFYfSN2nyQ.text: Wow, can I give a shoutout to the SERVICE here at King Fish Poke!!! We originally came to this shopping center for the middle eastern grill next door, but saw the poke shop and thought we'd just stick our head in and see what they had. One of the male workers saw us reading the menu and proceed to come over and talk us through the menu, his personal favorite, and recommend mix-ins and sauces and such -- after all that, how could we say no? The woman at counter (it's a chipotle-style assembly line) began to help my companion, and the man who was formerly talking to us put on a pair of gloves to serve me when he realized I wanted to order too, even though I didn't mind waiting for her to finish with my companion -- after all, we were the only two in line. Then, once we got our food, he came over about five minutes after we sat down to check on us and see how we liked it. Every conversation we had with him, he had a big smile on his face. If I lived in charlotte, I would come here for the service alone!  Now, as to what I actually paid for: the food. My boyfriend and I both enjoyed our meal; they offer sushi burritos, bowls, and salads. My boyfriend said he wished they had a bit more variety in fish, but that didn't take away from his experience. And all mix-ins and sauces are unlimited!

2yxgw7gwJtKgvDtOObblQw.text: Go here!  If you like sushi, you will love this place.  We were going through the area and saw this place on Yelp.  So glad we decided to give it a try.  The ingredients are super fresh, prices are reasonable, and combinations are endless.  I had the bowl with double ahi tuna, veggies, edamame and added crab salad.  Delish, and my only regret is that this place isn't closer to my hometown so we could eat here more often.  Chatted with the owner a bit while ordering, and he was super helpful and just an overall nice guy.  Great experience all around!

8vSCgRPJY495QYMfQLmJ1A.text: What a great find! The fish was fresh, the toppings plentiful, the price was more than fair, and the staff was friendly and went above and beyond. They were kind enough to let me try all of the sauces before I chose one. Will definitely go again!
